title: doc: answer "Why isn't x is the standard library?"
body:
This question comes up a lot. It'd be nice to have a canonical answer or set of answers that we can just link to. I don't know whether it belongs in the FAQ or the contributing page or the wiki. Probably the latter.

I don't think I'm the right person to write the first draft, although I'm happy to add to it. @bradfitz, maybe?
